title: Ponting’s ’business’ evidence at Cairns trial
text:
Chris Cairns trial: Ricky Ponting says he was with Brendon McCullum when proposition was made FOX SPORTS Chris Cairns trial: Ricky Ponting says he was with Brendon McCullum when proposition was made FOX SPORTS Relive Chris Cairns at his best 1:08 
Cricket: Relive some of New Zealand batsman Chris Cairns' best innings against Australia October 14th 2015 7 days ago /video/video.news.com.au/Sport/Cricket/News/ 
FORMER Australia captain Ricky Ponting has told the Chris Cairns perjury trial that he was with Brendon McCullum when the Kiwi received a business proposition from Cairns in 2008. 
Ponting told the Southwark Crown Court via video link from Australia that he was in the same Indian hotel room as McCullum when he spoke to Cairns on the telephone. 
“We were just sitting, sharing a drink, when he received a phone call — his phone rang,” Ponting said. “It was a very brief phone conversation, probably less than five minutes. 
“He put the phone down, hung up and said it was Cairnsy and he ‘just made me a business proposition’. 
“We stayed together for a short time. I didn’t ask any more questions ... As soon as I heard it was about business, I wasn’t interested any more.” Chris Cairns arrives at Southwark Crown Court to stand trial for perjury. 
Ponting and McCullum were at the time playing for the Kolkata Knight Riders in the IPL. The pair were staying in the same hotel on the eve of the inaugural Indian Premier League event. Other Stories
